Name: polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled to generic market for high density PE granulate | polyethylene, high density, granulate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2013:Manufacture of plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16275/documentation

This is a renaming activity linking recycled polyethylene (PE), high density (HD), granulate to the generic market for HD-PE granulate. ;Transport distances for road and rail freight based product category SCTG code 242 in the US BTS Commodity Flow Survey from 2012, US Dep. Of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Air freight was omitted due to assumed low relevance for this product category.
